mapper.select: select id, send_time, topic, content, type, is_read as beRead, from_id, from_nickname, to_id, to_nickname, gmt_create, gmt_modified, is_deleted as beDeleted from `message` where `to_id` = #{userId} and `is_deleted` = 0 and type like #{queryString} order by `id` desc limit #{base}, 10;

select id, send_time, topic, content, type, is_read as beRead, from_id, from_nickname, to_id, to_nickname, gmt_create, gmt_modified, is_deleted as beDeleted from `message` where `to_id` = #{userId} and `is_read` = 0 and `is_deleted` = 0 order by `id` desc limit 5;

select id, send_time, topic, content, type, is_read as beRead, from_id, from_nickname, to_id, to_nickname, gmt_create, gmt_modified, is_deleted as beDeleted from `message` where `id` = #{id} and `is_deleted` = 0;
mapper.insert: insert into `message`( send_time, topic, content, type, is_read, from_id, from_nickname, to_id, to_nickname, gmt_create, gmt_modified, is_deleted) values ( now(), #{topic}, #{content}, #{type}, #{beRead}, #{fromId}, #{fromNickname}, #{toId}, #{toNickname}, now(), now(), 0);
mapper.update: update `message` set is_deleted = 1, gmt_modified = now() where id = #{id};
update `message` set is_read = #{isRead}, gmt_modified = now() where id = #{id};
